name: Chakrabarthi Phoenix Dragon, Nirvana Jheva
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], choose up to one "Trickstar" and up to one  unit from your drop, and call them to (RC).
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards in the XoverDress state, and [Stand] it.

name: Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra
effect:
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit is Armed, [Soul-Charge 1], choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If this unit is Armed with two or more cards, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], retire all of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Demonic Jewel Dragon, Drajeweled
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Soul-Charge 2]. If all of the cards [Soul-Charge] have different grades, you may draw a card.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 4 cards with different grades], choose one of your opponent's vanguards, until end of turn, increase or decrease its [Power] to 1, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Critical] +1.

name: Blitz CEO, Welstra
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, choose a Product from your Order zone, and operate it. (Activate its Operate ability)
[AUTO](VC):When you operate a Product, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Apex Ruler, Bastion
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your grade 3 units get [Power] +2000. 
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle that your drive check revealed a grade 3, [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your rear-guards, [Stand] it, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Youthberk "Skyfall Arms"
effect:
[RevolDress]－[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, choose up to one card with "RevolForm" in its card name from your hand, ride it as [Stand], and it gets drive -2 until end of turn.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "RevolForm" in its card name from among them and reveal it and put it into your hand, or choose up to one grade 2 or less card from among them and call it to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, and until end of turn, that unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power] +5000. If you persona rode this turn, choose three rear-guards instead of one.

name: Grand March of Full Bloom, Lianorn
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC) or discard it.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], and boost this unit with all of your back row [Stand] units with "Boost". If you boosted this unit with three or more units, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle, and at the end of that battle, choose two of your back row rear-guards, and [Stand] them.
